TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit IndexOutOfRangeException extends System.SystemException
Public NotInheritable Class IndexOutOfRangeException Inherits SystemException
public ref class IndexOutOfRangeException sealed : SystemException

summary.span: 试图访问索引超出界限的数组或集合的元素时引发的异常。

span.span: The exception that is thrown when an attempt is made to access an element of an array or collection with an index that is outside its bounds.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当使用无效索引访问数组或集合的成员, 或者从缓冲区中的特定位置读取或写入时, 将引发异常。An exception is thrown when an invalid index is used to access a member of an array or a collection, or to read or write from a particular location in a buffer. 此异常继承自类 , 但不添加唯一成员。This exception inherits from the class but adds no unique members. 通常, 由于开发人员错误, 将引发异常。Typically, an exception is thrown as a result of developer error. 应该诊断错误的原因并更正代码, 而不是处理异常。Instead of handling the exception, you should diagnose the cause of the error and correct your code. 此错误的最常见原因是:The most common causes of the error are: - 忘记集合或从零开始的数组的上限比其成员或元素的数量少一, 如下面的示例所示。Forgetting that the upper bound of a collection or a zero-based array is one less than its number of members or elements, as the following example illustrates. [!code-csharp[System.IndexOutOfRangeException#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.indexoutofrangeexception/cs/length1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.IndexOutOfRangeException#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.indexoutofrangeexception/vb/length1.vb#3)] 若要更正此错误, 可以使用如下所示的代码。To correct the error, you can use code like the following. [!code-csharp[System.IndexOutOfRangeException#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.indexoutofrangeexception/cs/length2.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.IndexOutOfRangeException#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.indexoutofrangeexception/vb/length2.vb#4)] 或者, 您可以使用`foreach`语句 (在中C#) 或`For Each`语句 (在 Visual Basic 中), 而不是按索引来循环访问数组中的所有元素。Alternately, instead of iterating all the elements in the array by their index, you can use the `foreach` statement (in C#) or the `For Each` statement (in Visual Basic). - 尝试将一个数组元素分配给另一个数组, 该数组的数组与原始数组相比, 其元素少。Attempting to assign an array element to another array that has not been adequately dimensioned and that has fewer elements than the original array. 下面的示例尝试将`value1`数组中的最后一个元素分配给`value2`数组中的同一元素。The following example attempts to assign the last element in the `value1` array to the same element in the `value2` array. 但是, `value2`数组已错误地标注为包含六个或七个元素。However, the `value2` array has been incorrectly dimensioned to have six instead of seven elements. 因此, 分配会引发异常。As a result, the assignment throws an exception. [!code-csharp[System.IndexOutOfRangeException#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.indexoutofrangeexception/cs/Uninit1.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.IndexOutOfRangeException#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.indexoutofrangeexception/vb/Uninit1.vb#10)] - 使用搜索方法返回的值从特定索引位置开始循环访问数组或集合的一部分。Using a value returned by a search method to iterate a portion of an array or collection starting at a particular index position. 如果忘记检查搜索操作是否找到了匹配项, 则运行时将引发异常, 如本示例中所示。If you forget to check whether the search operation found a match, the runtime throws an exception, as shown in this example. [!code-csharp[System.IndexOutOfRangeException#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.indexoutofrangeexception/cs/negative1.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.IndexOutOfRangeException#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.indexoutofrangeexception/vb/negative1.vb#5)] 在这种情况下 , 如果找不到匹配项, 该方法将返回-1, 这是无效的索引值。In this case, the method returns -1, which is an invalid index value, when it fails to find a match. 若要更正此错误, 请检查搜索方法的返回值, 然后循环访问数组, 如本示例中所示。To correct this error, check the search method's return value before iterating the array, as shown in this example. [!code-csharp[System.IndexOutOfRangeException#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.indexoutofrangeexception/cs/negative2.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.IndexOutOfRangeException#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.indexoutofrangeexception/vb/negative2.vb#6)] - 尝试使用或枚举查询返回的结果集、集合或数组, 而不测试返回的对象是否具有任何有效数据。Trying to use or enumerate a result set, collection, or array returned by a query without testing whether the returned object has any valid data. - 使用计算得出的值定义起始索引、结束索引或要迭代的项数。Using a computed value to define the starting index, the ending index, or the number of items to be iterated. 如果计算结果不是预期的, 则可能会导致异常。If the result of the computation is unexpected, it might result in an exception. 应在计算索引值时检查程序的逻辑, 并在循环访问数组或集合之前验证该值。You should check your program's logic in calculating the index value and validate the value before iterating the array or collection. 必须满足以下条件:否则, 将引发异常:The following conditions must all be true; otherwise, an exception is thrown: - 对于要循环访问的数组的维度, 或大于或等于集合的集合, 开始索引必须大于或等于。The starting index must be greater than or equal to for the dimension of the array that you want to iterate, or greater than or equal to 0 for a collection. - 对于要循环访问的数组的维度, 或不能大于或等于集合的`Count`属性, 结束索引不能超过。The ending index cannot exceed for the dimension of the array that you want to iterate, or cannot be greater than or equal to the `Count` property of a collection. - 对于要循环访问的数组的维度, 以下公式必须为 true:The following equation must be true for the dimension of the array that you want to iterate: ``` start_index >= lower_bound And start_index + items_to_iterate - 1 <= upper_bound ``` 对于集合, 以下公式必须为 true:For a collection, the following equation must be true: ``` start_index >= 0 And start_index + items_to_iterate <= Count ``` > [!TIP] > 数组或集合的起始索引绝不能为负数。The starting index of an array or collection can never be a negative number. - 假设数组必须从零开始。Assuming that an array must be zero-based. 不是从零开始的数组可以通过方法创建, 并且可由 COM 互操作返回, 尽管它们不符合 CLS。Arrays that are not zero-based can be created by the method and can be returned by COM interop, although they aren't CLS-compliant. 下面的示例演示当你尝试循环访问由方法创建的非从零开始的数组时引发的。The following example illustrates the that is thrown when you try to iterate a non-zero-based array created by the method. [!code-csharp[System.IndexOutOfRangeException#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.indexoutofrangeexception/cs/nonzero1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.IndexOutOfRangeException#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.indexoutofrangeexception/vb/nonzero1.vb#1)] 若要更正此错误, 如下面的示例所示, 可以调用方法, 而不是假设数组的起始索引。To correct the error, as the following example does, you can call the method instead of making assumptions about the starting index of an array. [!code-csharp[System.IndexOutOfRangeException#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.indexoutofrangeexception/cs/nonzero2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.IndexOutOfRangeException#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.indexoutofrangeexception/vb/nonzero2.vb#2)] 请注意, 当调用方法来获取数组的起始索引时, 还应调用方法来获取其结束索引。Note that when you call the method to get the starting index of an array, you should also call the method to get its ending index. - 将索引与数字数组或集合中该索引处的值混淆。Confusing an index and the value at that index in a numeric array or collection. 当使用语句 (在中`foreach` C#) 或`For Each`语句 (在 Visual Basic 中) 时, 通常会发生此问题。This issue usually occurs when using the `foreach` statement (in C#) or the `For Each` statement (in Visual Basic). 以下示例演示了该问题。The following example illustrates the problem. [!code-csharp[System.IndexOutOfRangeException#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.indexoutofrangeexception/cs/foreach1.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.IndexOutOfRangeException#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.indexoutofrangeexception/vb/foreach1.vb#7)] 迭代构造返回数组或集合中的每个值, 而不是其索引。The iteration construct returns each value in an array or collection, not its index. 若要消除此异常, 请使用此代码。To eliminate the exception, use this code. [!code-csharp[System.IndexOutOfRangeException#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.indexoutofrangeexception/cs/foreach2.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.IndexOutOfRangeException#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.indexoutofrangeexception/vb/foreach2.vb#8)] - 为属性提供了无效的列名称。Providing an invalid column name to the property. - 违反线程安全。Violating thread safety. 如果对象不是在中访问的, 则从同一对象读取、从多个线程写入同一对象或从不同线程中枚举对象的操作可能会引发。 线程安全的方式。Operations such as reading from the same object, writing to the same object from multiple threads, or enumerating the objects in a from different threads can throw an if the object isn't accessed in a thread-safe way. 此异常通常是间歇性的, 因为它依赖于争用条件。This exception is typically intermittent because it relies on a race condition. 如果索引值不正确或无效, 或者如果正在操作的数组的大小不正确, 则使用硬编码索引值来操作数组可能会引发异常。Using hard-coded index values to manipulate an array is likely to throw an exception if the index value is incorrect or invalid, or if the size of the array being manipulation is unexpected. 若要防止操作引发异常, 可以执行以下操作:To prevent an operation from throwing an exception, you can do the following: - 使用[foreach](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ttw7t8t6.aspx)语句 (在中C#为) 或[为每个 .。。下一](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5ebk1751.aspx)构造 (在 Visual Basic 中), 而不是按索引来循环访问元素。Iterate the elements of the array using the [foreach](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ttw7t8t6.aspx) statement (in C#) or the [For Each...Next](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5ebk1751.aspx) construct (in Visual Basic) instead of iterating elements by index. - 按索引从方法返回的索引开始循环访问元素, 并以方法返回的索引结束。Iterate the elements by index starting with the index returned by the method and ending with the index returned by the method. - 如果要将一个数组中的元素分配给另一个数组, 请确保目标数组的元素与源数组的元素数至少与源数组的数目相同。If you are assigning elements in one array to another, ensure that the target array has at least as many elements as the source array by comparing their properties. 有关实例的初始属性值的列表，请参阅构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructors. 以下中间语言 (IL) 指令引发:The following intermediate language (IL) instructions throw : - ldelem.\<类型 >ldelem.\ - ldelemaldelema - stelem.\stelem.\ 使用 COR_E_INDEXOUTOFRANGE 值为0x80131508 的 HRESULT。 uses the HRESULT COR_E_INDEXOUTOFRANGE, which has the value 0x80131508.

related.span: 在 .NET 中处理和引发异常

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数将新实例的属性初始化为系统提供的描述错误的消息, 如 "数组索引超出范围"。This constructor initializes the property of the new instance to a system-supplied message that describes the error, such as "An array index is out of range." 此消息将当前系统区域性考虑在内。This message takes into account the current system culture. 下表显示 的实例的初始属性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |PropertyProperty|“值”Value| |--------------|-----------| ||空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 `Nothing`）。A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).| ||本地化的错误消息字符串。The localized error message string.|

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string message) cil managed

span.span: The message that describes the error.

summary.span: 用指定的错误消息初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数`message`使用参数初始化新异常的属性。This constructor initializes the property of the new exception using the `message` parameter. `message` 的内容被设计为人可理解的形式。The content of `message` is intended to be understood by humans. 此构造函数的调用方需要确保此字符串已针对当前系统区域性进行了本地化。The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture. 下表显示 的实例的初始属性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |PropertyProperty|“值”Value| |--------------|-----------| ||空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 `Nothing`）。A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).| ||错误消息字符串。The error message string.|

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string message, class System.Exception innerException) cil managed
Public Sub New (message As String, innerException As Exception)

param.name: message
param.span: 解释异常原因的错误消息。

span.span: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.

param.name: innerException

span.span: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.

param.span: 如果 参数不是 null 引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 ），则在处理内部异常的 块中引发当前异常。

span.span: If the parameter is not a null reference ( in Visual Basic), the current exception is raised in a block that handles the inner exception.

summary.span: 使用指定的错误消息和对作为此异常原因的内部异常的引用来初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因前一个异常而直接引发的异常应在 属性中包含对前一个异常的引用。An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the property. `InnerException` 属性返回传递到构造函数中的相同值，或者如果 `Nothing` 属性不向构造函数提供内部异常值，则为空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 `InnerException`）。The `InnerException` property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) if the `InnerException` property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor. 下表显示 的实例的初始属性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |PropertyProperty|“值”Value| |--------------|-----------| ||内部异常引用。The inner exception reference.| ||错误消息字符串。The error message string.|
